name: Kidnapped (itch) (Jean-Marc Studio | JMS)
description:
THE GAME

In the back of a truck you have to help the police finding you by sending them messages!

But... don't get caught!

Use your telephone ("E") to communicate with the Police, then look around you, use the map of your souvenirs ("M") to try to locate yourself and tell the police where you think you are. If you give them enough info, they'll surely get you out of there alive!

Who knows what they plan to do with your body...

This game was made within 1 week by a team of 2 guys.
It was created to fit the ScreamCity Game Jam (April 2019) requirement which is : Horror game in a city.

INPUTS

- WASD or "Arrows" to move your shoulders.
- "Mouse" to move your head.
- "Right Click" to open/close your eyes
- "E" to take/hide your phone.
- "M" to use/hide the map.
